attributes.action: Ban child allowance for the first child to prevent young unmarried girls getting pregnant just to get benefits and housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I  am 58 and when I had my first child  in 1974 there was no child benefit payable for the first child. If parents of daughters getting pregnant had to pay the cost of their daughters offspring and house them ,I think more parents would make sure their daughters practised birth control methods. Also it would be a reduction of the taxpayers burden to pay for these irresponsible young girls.
